subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie, nursing a sprained left wrist the past two months, will play her first tournament since February starting Thursday at the $2.2 million L.P.G.A. Michelob Ultra Open in Williamsburg, Va.
snippet: Michelle Wie, nursing a sprained left wrist the past two months, will play her first tournament since February starting Thursday at the $2.2 million L.P.G.A. Michelob Ultra Open in Williamsburg, Va.
